snippet: With improving fiscal conditions and redistricting mostly in the rearview mirror, the 2013 Texas legislative session will face pressing policy questions on education, health care and transportation projects.
lead_paragraph: With improving fiscal conditions and redistricting mostly in the rearview mirror, the 2013 Texas legislative session will face pressing policy questions on education, health care and transportation projects.

headline.seo: Texas Legislature Faces a New Set of Priorities
headline.main: New Legislature Faces a New Set of Priorities
headline.print_headline: New Legislature Faces a New Set of Priorities
